End User License Agreement (EULA)

CARR makes this Application available for consumers’ entertainment and enjoyment only. Nothing in this Application is intended, nor will be construed, as medical advice, medical information, diagnosis, health recommendations or suggestions.

Except for the limited licensed granted in this EULA, CARR retains all right, title and interest in the Application and all proprietary rights in the Application, including copyrights and trademarks.

PRIVACY:   CARR does not see, collect, store, or archive any data you enter into the Application. Any and all information you enter into the Application is stored on your device and not on CARR’s website or server. Therefore, CARR and its developer are not responsible for any damages resulting from the loss or theft of that information. Similarly, CARR AND its developer are not responsible or liable for loss, theft or misuse of any data that you choose to share, backup or store at any location or service.

CHARGES:   While CARR does not charge for the use of this Application, normal carrier data fees may apply. Please consult your carrier to understand any charges related to carrier data fees.

NO ENDORSEMENT:   This Application may use various applications and services provided by your carrier or device. The presence of these applications and services does not imply, and should not be interpreted as endorsement, sanctions, approval or authorization of these applications and services. CARR and its developer make no guarantee or warranty, expressed or implied, concerning the functionality or accuracy of these applications and services.

NO SALES:   User agrees this above-named Application may not be sold to any third party, may not be reversed-engineered, nor modified without the prior and express written consent of CARR.

LICENSE AGREEMENT CHANGES/PUBLICATIONS STATEMENT:   The Terms of Agreement for use of this Application are subject to change, without notice, upon public posting by CARR.
